The spec http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5849#section-3.4.1.2 indicates that:

> The host and port values MUST match the content of the HTTP
> request "Host" header field.

The oauthlib implementation appears to use the request URL authority and appears to ignore the Host header when collecting signature base string inputs.
title: Use Host rather than URL authority as signature base string authority
Use Host rather than URL authority as signature base string authority
